rule_results.title: Risk management system must be established
rule_results.details: Verify that a risk management system has been established, implemented, documented and maintained.
rule_results.remediation: Establish a formal risk management system covering the full lifecycle of the AI system.

citations.exact_quote: A risk management system shall be established, implemented, documented and maintained

rule_results.title: Risk management must be continuous and iterative
rule_results.details: Verify that the risk management system is a continuous iterative process throughout the AI system lifecycle.
rule_results.remediation: Implement continuous risk monitoring with periodic reviews and updates throughout the system lifecycle.

citations.exact_quote: continuous iterative process planned and run throughout the entire lifecycle

rule_results.title: Known and foreseeable risks must be identified
rule_results.details: Verify that the provider has identified and analyzed known and reasonably foreseeable risks to health, safety or fundamental rights.
rule_results.remediation: Document all known and reasonably foreseeable risks with a formal risk identification and analysis process.

citations.exact_quote: identification and analysis of the known and reasonably foreseeable risks

rule_results.title: Foreseeable misuse risks must be evaluated
rule_results.details: Verify that risks from foreseeable misuse have been estimated and evaluated.
rule_results.remediation: Conduct a misuse scenario analysis and document risk estimates for each foreseeable misuse case.

citations.exact_quote: estimation and evaluation of the risks that may emerge

rule_results.title: Risk management measures must be adopted
rule_results.details: Verify that appropriate and targeted risk management measures have been adopted.
rule_results.remediation: Define and implement at least two risk management measures that address the identified risks.

citations.exact_quote: adoption of appropriate and targeted risk management measures

rule_results.title: Risk measures interaction must be assessed
rule_results.details: Verify that risk management measures consider interaction effects and achieve appropriate balance.
rule_results.remediation: Document how risk management measures interact with each other and demonstrate an appropriate balance.

citations.exact_quote: give due consideration to the effects and possible interaction of the measures

rule_results.title: System testing procedures must be documented
rule_results.details: Verify that the system has been tested with documented procedures to identify risk management measures.
rule_results.remediation: Implement and document testing procedures to identify the most appropriate risk management measures.

citations.exact_quote: High-risk AI systems shall be tested

rule_results.title: Testing must use defined metrics and thresholds
rule_results.details: Verify that testing is carried out against prior defined metrics and probabilistic thresholds.
rule_results.remediation: Define explicit metrics and probabilistic thresholds for all testing procedures.

citations.exact_quote: Testing shall be carried out against prior defined metrics and probabilistic thresholds

rule_results.title: Data governance practices must be documented
rule_results.details: Verify that data governance and management practices are documented and appropriate for the intended purpose.
rule_results.remediation: Document data governance and management practices covering the full data lifecycle.

citations.exact_quote: subject to data governance and management practices

rule_results.title: Data collection process must be documented
rule_results.details: Verify that data collection processes and data origin are documented.
rule_results.remediation: Document data collection processes including sources, methods, and original purpose.

citations.exact_quote: data collection processes and their origin

rule_results.title: Data preprocessing operations must be documented
rule_results.details: Verify that data-preparation processing operations are documented.
rule_results.remediation: Document all data-preparation operations including annotation, labelling, cleaning and enrichment procedures.

citations.exact_quote: data-preparation processing operations

rule_results.title: Training data relevance must be documented
rule_results.details: Verify that training data relevance for the intended purpose is documented.
rule_results.remediation: Document how training datasets are relevant and representative for the intended purpose.

citations.exact_quote: relevant, sufficiently representative, and to the best extent possible, free of errors

rule_results.title: Data representativeness for deployment context must be documented
rule_results.details: Verify that datasets account for the geographical, contextual and functional settings of deployment.
rule_results.remediation: Document how training data accounts for the specific deployment context and population characteristics.

citations.exact_quote: characteristics or elements that are particular to the specific geographical, contextual, behavioural or functional setting

rule_results.title: Bias examination must cover health, safety, fundamental rights and discrimination
rule_results.details: Verify that a bias examination has been conducted covering health/safety, fundamental rights, and prohibited discrimination.
rule_results.remediation: Conduct a comprehensive bias examination covering health/safety impacts, fundamental rights implications, and prohibited discrimination grounds.

citations.exact_quote: examination in view of possible biases

rule_results.title: Special category data processing must have appropriate safeguards
rule_results.details: Verify that processing of special categories of personal data is strictly necessary and has appropriate safeguards.
rule_results.remediation: Implement appropriate safeguards for any processing of special categories of personal data.

citations.exact_quote: appropriate safeguards for the fundamental rights and freedoms

rule_results.title: Datasets meeting quality criteria must be used
rule_results.details: Verify that training, validation and testing datasets are identified and meet quality criteria.
rule_results.remediation: Identify and document all training, validation and testing datasets with their quality criteria.

citations.exact_quote: training, validation and testing data sets that meet the quality criteria

rule_results.title: Technical documentation must exist before market placement
rule_results.details: Verify that technical documentation has been drawn up before the AI system is placed on the market.
rule_results.remediation: Create comprehensive technical documentation in accordance with Annex IV before placing the system on the market.

citations.exact_quote: technical documentation shall be drawn up before that system is placed on the market

rule_results.title: Technical documentation must be kept up to date
rule_results.details: Verify that technical documentation is kept up to date throughout the system lifecycle.
rule_results.remediation: Establish a process for regularly updating technical documentation when changes occur.

citations.exact_quote: shall be kept up to date

rule_results.title: Documentation must demonstrate compliance
rule_results.details: Verify that technical documentation demonstrates compliance with Chapter III Section 2 requirements.
rule_results.remediation: Ensure documentation explicitly addresses and demonstrates compliance with each requirement.

citations.exact_quote: demonstrate that the high-risk AI system complies

rule_results.title: Documentation must be available to authorities
rule_results.details: Verify that documentation provides authorities with all necessary compliance information.
rule_results.remediation: Ensure documentation is accessible and provides sufficient information for authority review.

citations.exact_quote: provide national competent authorities

rule_results.title: Documentation must contain Annex IV minimum elements
rule_results.details: Verify that technical documentation contains at minimum the elements set out in Annex IV.
rule_results.remediation: Review documentation against Annex IV checklist and add any missing elements.

citations.exact_quote: contain, at a minimum, the elements set out in Annex IV

rule_results.title: Documentation must be clear and comprehensive
rule_results.details: Verify that documentation is written in a clear, comprehensive, and intelligible form.
rule_results.remediation: Ensure documentation uses clear language, logical structure, and is understandable by technical experts.

citations.exact_quote: clear, comprehensive, and intelligible form

rule_results.title: Technical documentation must be accessible at a known location
rule_results.details: Verify that technical documentation is accessible (e.g., URL or internal repository).
rule_results.remediation: Provide a URL or internal reference to the location where documentation can be accessed.

citations.exact_quote: technical documentation shall be drawn up

rule_results.title: Automatic event logging must be enabled
rule_results.details: Verify that the system technically supports automatic recording of events (logs).
rule_results.remediation: Implement automatic event logging throughout the system lifecycle.

citations.exact_quote: shall technically allow for the automatic recording of events

rule_results.title: Risk-relevant events must be logged
rule_results.details: Verify that logging captures events relevant to risk identification.
rule_results.remediation: Add logging for risk-relevant events including anomalies, errors, and safety-critical decisions.

citations.exact_quote: recording of events relevant to the identification of situations

rule_results.title: Logging must conform to recognised standards
rule_results.details: Verify that logging capabilities conform to recognised standards or common specifications.
rule_results.remediation: Align logging capabilities with recognised standards such as ISO 27001 or equivalent.

citations.exact_quote: conform to recognised standards or common specifications

rule_results.title: Logging must ensure lifecycle traceability
rule_results.details: Verify that logging capabilities ensure traceability throughout the system lifecycle.
rule_results.remediation: Implement comprehensive logging covering all lifecycle stages with sufficient detail for traceability.

citations.exact_quote: traceability of the AI system's functioning throughout its lifecycle

rule_results.title: Logging must enable operational monitoring
rule_results.details: Verify that logging enables monitoring of the AI system operation.
rule_results.remediation: Add operational monitoring capabilities to the logging system.

citations.exact_quote: enable the monitoring of the operation

rule_results.title: Logging must facilitate post-market monitoring
rule_results.details: Verify that logging facilitates post-market monitoring as per Article 72.
rule_results.remediation: Implement logging features that support post-market monitoring requirements.

citations.exact_quote: facilitate the post-market monitoring

rule_results.title: Usage periods and verification personnel must be recorded
rule_results.details: Verify that logging records usage periods, reference databases, and verification personnel.
rule_results.remediation: Add logging of usage sessions, reference database checks, and human verification records.

citations.exact_quote: recording of the period of each use of the system

rule_results.title: System operation must be sufficiently transparent
rule_results.details: Verify that the system is designed to ensure operation is transparent enough for deployers to interpret output.
rule_results.remediation: Design the system with output explanations, confidence scores, or feature attribution to ensure transparency.

citations.exact_quote: operation is sufficiently transparent

rule_results.title: Instructions for use must be provided
rule_results.details: Verify that instructions for use are provided in an appropriate digital format.
rule_results.remediation: Create comprehensive instructions for use in digital format for deployers.

citations.exact_quote: accompanied by instructions for use in an appropriate digital format

rule_results.title: Provider identity must be included in instructions
rule_results.details: Verify that provider identity and contact details are included in instructions.
rule_results.remediation: Include complete provider identity and contact details in the instructions for use.

citations.exact_quote: identity and the contact details of the provider

rule_results.title: System capabilities and limitations must be documented
rule_results.details: Verify that system characteristics, capabilities and limitations of performance are documented.
rule_results.remediation: Document all system capabilities, limitations, and known performance boundaries.

citations.exact_quote: characteristics, capabilities and limitations of performance

rule_results.title: Human oversight measures must be documented in instructions
rule_results.details: Verify that human oversight measures are described in the instructions for use.
rule_results.remediation: Document human oversight measures in the instructions for use, including interpretation guidance.

citations.exact_quote: human oversight measures referred to in Article 14

rule_results.title: Intended purpose must be documented
rule_results.details: Verify that intended purpose is clearly documented in instructions.
rule_results.remediation: Clearly document the intended purpose and foreseeable misuse circumstances.

citations.exact_quote: intended purpose of the AI system

rule_results.title: Accuracy levels must be declared in instructions
rule_results.details: Verify that accuracy levels are declared in the instructions for use.
rule_results.remediation: Declare specific accuracy levels and metrics in the instructions for use.

citations.exact_quote: the level of accuracy

rule_results.title: Human oversight measures must be implemented
rule_results.details: Verify that the system is designed with human oversight measures for natural persons.
rule_results.remediation: Implement human oversight measures including human-machine interface tools.

citations.exact_quote: effectively overseen by natural persons

rule_results.title: Oversight must minimise risks effectively
rule_results.details: Verify that human oversight measures are sufficient to minimise risks to health, safety and fundamental rights.
rule_results.remediation: Implement multiple oversight measures that specifically target identified risks.

citations.exact_quote: minimising the risks to health, safety or fundamental rights

rule_results.title: Oversight personnel must understand system capabilities and limitations
rule_results.details: Verify that oversight measures enable understanding of system capacities and limitations.
rule_results.remediation: Ensure limitations are documented and instructions for use are provided to oversight personnel.

citations.exact_quote: fully understand the capacities and limitations

rule_results.title: Automation bias safeguards must be implemented
rule_results.details: Verify that safeguards against automation bias are implemented, especially for decision-support systems.
rule_results.remediation: Implement automation bias safeguards such as mandatory confirmation steps, uncertainty indicators, or periodic human-only reviews.

citations.exact_quote: automation bias

rule_results.title: Output interpretation tools must be available
rule_results.details: Verify that tools and methods for correct interpretation of system output are available.
rule_results.remediation: Provide interpretation tools such as confidence scores, feature importance, or SHAP values.

citations.exact_quote: correctly interpret the high-risk AI system's output

rule_results.title: Human override capability must be available
rule_results.details: Verify that humans can override, reverse or disregard the AI system's output.
rule_results.remediation: Implement mechanisms allowing human operators to override or reverse AI decisions.

citations.exact_quote: override or reverse the output

rule_results.title: System interruption capability must be available
rule_results.details: Verify that humans can interrupt or stop the AI system safely.
rule_results.remediation: Implement a 'stop' button or similar procedure that allows the system to halt safely.

citations.exact_quote: interrupt the system through a 'stop' button

rule_results.title: Oversight personnel must be able to monitor system in use
rule_results.details: Verify that the system is provided to deployers in a way that enables proper monitoring.
rule_results.remediation: Provide monitoring dashboards or tools that enable oversight personnel to monitor system operation in real-time.

citations.exact_quote: enabled to properly monitor the system in use

rule_results.title: Accuracy metrics must be documented
rule_results.details: Verify that accuracy metrics have been documented demonstrating appropriate accuracy levels.
rule_results.remediation: Document accuracy metrics with benchmarks demonstrating appropriate performance levels.

citations.exact_quote: achieve an appropriate level of accuracy

rule_results.title: Accuracy levels must be declared in instructions
rule_results.details: Verify that accuracy levels and relevant metrics are declared in the instructions of use.
rule_results.remediation: Declare specific accuracy levels and metrics in the instructions for use.

citations.exact_quote: levels of accuracy and the relevant accuracy metrics shall be declared

rule_results.title: Disaggregated performance metrics must be provided
rule_results.details: Verify that accuracy is measured using disaggregated metrics across relevant demographic groups.
rule_results.remediation: Measure and declare accuracy using disaggregated metrics across relevant demographic groups.

citations.exact_quote: accuracy shall be measured and declared using disaggregated metrics

rule_results.title: Robustness measures must be implemented
rule_results.details: Verify that the system has robustness measures against errors, faults and inconsistencies.
rule_results.remediation: Implement robustness measures such as input validation, error handling, and redundancy.

citations.exact_quote: resilient as possible regarding errors, faults or inconsistencies

rule_results.title: Technical and organisational robustness measures must be taken
rule_results.details: Verify that technical and organisational measures ensure robustness including redundancy.
rule_results.remediation: Implement both technical and organisational robustness measures including redundancy solutions.

citations.exact_quote: Technical and organisational measures shall be taken

rule_results.title: Adversarial testing must be performed
rule_results.details: Verify that the system has been tested for resilience against unauthorized manipulation.
rule_results.remediation: Perform adversarial testing to validate resilience against unauthorized third party manipulation.

citations.exact_quote: resilient against attempts by unauthorised third parties

rule_results.title: Cybersecurity measures must be appropriate
rule_results.details: Verify that cybersecurity measures are implemented including defences against data/model poisoning and adversarial attacks.
rule_results.remediation: Implement comprehensive cybersecurity measures covering data poisoning, model poisoning, adversarial examples, and confidentiality attacks.

citations.exact_quote: technical solutions aimed at ensuring the cybersecurity

rule_results.title: Feedback loop risks must be mitigated for continuous learning systems
rule_results.details: Verify that continuous learning systems address feedback loop risks with mitigation measures.
rule_results.remediation: Implement feedback loop mitigation such as data drift monitoring, output monitoring, and retraining safeguards.

citations.exact_quote: feedback loops are duly addressed with appropriate mitigation measures

critical_gaps.description: Verify that safeguards against automation bias are implemented, especially for decision-support systems.
critical_gaps.remediation: Implement automation bias safeguards such as mandatory confirmation steps, uncertainty indicators, or periodic human-only reviews.

citations.exact_quote: automation bias
